message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.PL, cs.SE

Reasoning: 
- cs.CR (Cryptography and Security): The paper discusses security guarantees of the proposed consensus protocol and mining algorithm. 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing): The paper focuses on designing a decentralized public ledger with high performance and discusses data sharding and evaluation of smart contracts in a sharding friendly virtual machine. 
- cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms): The paper proposes a new consensus protocol and mining algorithm, which involves designing efficient data structures and algorithms. 
- cs.PL (Programming Languages): The paper proposes a new virtual machine on top of Ethereum, which adds permissioned-chain based transaction processing capabilities in a permissionless setting. 
- cs.SE (Software Engineering): The paper discusses technical details of the proposed consensus protocol, mining algorithm, and virtual machine, which involves software engineering principles.
